name: Ambush at Deimos Refinery
description: //*********// You left the tainted warehouse behind, but the Enemy knows now that you are advancing through His hosts with unexpected fury and skill. Now you are standing at a secondary entrance into the Deimos Refinery, knowing they are waiting for you. It will be hard, because the Demon Lord is smart, and He knows you are coming; so grab your gun tight and try to find the exit to the Deimos Delta Labs. Good Luck! //********//
